Detailed Description

Virtual base class for selection of a victim processor and a victim process

This class extends the Core::SelectVictimInterface in order to be able to select a victim process and (inherited) a vicitim processor.

Member Function Documentation

virtual Net::NodeInfo* WS::SelectVictimInterface::select_process (  )  [pure virtual]

Method that should be implemented to return a victim process

Implemented in WS::RandomVictim, WS::RoundRobinVictim, and WS::LeaderOfClusterStrategy.
